name: Deeper
body:
## Welcome to Deeper!
Deeper is a 2D Video Game Created by OrionDark7 with [Python](python.org) & [Pygame](pygame.org). It is a game set in the Depths of an unknown world, where you can Build, Dig, and Explore freely. It is coming soon this month (October 2016.).

## Screenshots
Yay! The fun stuff!

A newly generated world:
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OrionDark7/Deeper/gh-pages/images/Miners%20World.PNG)

Here's the main menu:
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OrionDark7/Deeper/gh-pages/images/mainMenu.PNG)
